title: How to take a screenshot with my laptop - Quora

response.answer_text: These are the ways that I know to screenshot your screen in laptop. #1 Press the “prtsc" button. Open Paint and press “ctrl+v” to paste. Then save your file as png or jpeg #2 Press “window button+prtsc button” and your screen will blink. Check your image at your picture folder. #3 Use the snipping tool. You can find it under accessories. It work like cropping picture. Hope it help!
If it is running Windows 10 then the keyboard shortcut is windows button+ print screen button.
